items.title: When will the Oscars give comedies proper recognition?
items.excerpt: If there’s one genre that just doesn’t get enough love at the Academy Awards, it’s horror . But if we had to pick another, it’s comedy, which is widely ignored at the Oscars despite being one of the most challenging genres to master. They have such a hard time being recognized…

items.title: Matt Fraction’s Batman #1 sells 500,000 copies
items.excerpt: Whether through film, television or ink, when the Bat-Signal is turned on, people will come. And that’s the case with the latest endeavor, Batman #1 , which is being marked as the best-selling comic of the year, with 500,000 copies sold.

items.title: Cult Classics That Were Box Office Bombs
